word_mean: 静脉炎：静脉的炎症，主要特点是静脉壁浸润和血栓形成，表现为患部水肿、僵硬和疼痛，化脓性感染时有脓毒血症的症状

sentence.Network_en: Only one third of the patients have phlebitis.
sentence.Network_cn: 仅有三分之一的病人有静脉炎.

sentence.Network_en: Phlebitis was noticed in 2 ( 5 % ) of the PICCs but none via subclavian access.
sentence.Network_cn: 静脉炎:PICC2例 ( 5% ),锁骨下静脉穿刺未发生.

sentence.Network_en: Results Patients with PICC had no phlebitis and physic liquor exosmosis.
sentence.Network_cn: picc置管途径给药无静脉炎及药液外渗.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: modern Latin, from Greek, from phleps, phleb- 'vein'

means.word_mean: 1. inflammation of a vein (usually in the legs)

auth_sentence.content: He nearly died after an attack of phlebitis and thought of taking his own life.
